title: Prompt Engineer
description:
Genpact (NYSE: G) is a global professional services and solutions firm delivering outcomes that shape the future. Our 125,000+ people across 30+ countries are driven by our innate curiosity, entrepreneurial agility, and desire to create lasting value for clients. Powered by our purpose – the relentless pursuit of a world that works better for people – we serve and transform leading enterprises, including the Fortune Global 500, with our deep business and industry knowledge, digital operations services, and expertise in data, technology, and AI.
Inviting applications for the role of Prompt EngineerLocation: Montreal QC Canada ( 3 days onsite/week)
We are seeking a highly experienced Prompt Engineer to develop, optimize, and refine AI-generated content and responses across various generative AI models. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of natural language processing (NLP), machine learning (ML), and AI model behavior. You will collaborate closely with data scientists, AI engineers, and product teams to enhance the effectiveness of AI-generated outputs. Key Responsibilities:• Design, test, and optimize high-quality prompts for various AI applications, ensuring accuracy, relevance, and engagement.• Analyze AI-generated responses and refine prompts to improve model behavior and output consistency.• Collaborate with AI/ML teams to fine-tune models based on performance metrics and user feedback.• Develop frameworks for prompt engineering best practices, ensuring scalability across different projects.• Conduct A/B testing on prompt variations to measure effectiveness and improve response quality.• Stay up to date with advancements in AI, NLP, and prompt engineering techniques.• Document prompt designs, iterations, and outcomes to support knowledge sharing and model improvements. Required Skills & Qualifications:• Extensive experience in NLP, machine learning, AI engineering, or related fields.• Strong expertise in prompt engineering for large language models (LLMs) like OpenAI’s GPT, Google’s Gemini, Claude, or similar.• Proficiency in Python and experience with AI frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or LangChain.• Deep understanding of AI model training, fine-tuning, and performance evaluation.• Experience in working with APIs for AI model integration.• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to optimize AI responses.• Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams, including engineers, designers, and product managers.• Excellent communication skills with the ability to explain AI behaviors and model outputs to non-technical stakeholders. Preferred Qualifications:• Experience with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and AI-driven knowledge systems.• Familiarity with ethical AI principles, bias mitigation, and AI model interpretability.• Previous experience in AI-driven chatbot development or conversational AI platforms.• Understanding of LLM fine-tuning and reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF).
Genpact is an Equal Opportunity Employer and considers applicants for all positions without regard to race, color, religion or belief, sex, age, national origin, citizenship status, marital status, military/veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity, physical or mental disability or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws. Genpact is committed to creating a dynamic work environment that values diversity and inclusion, respect and integrity, customer focus, and innovation. For more information, visit www.genpact.com . Follow us on Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, and YouTube.Furthermore, please do note that Genpact does not charge fees to process job applications and applicants are not required to pay to participate in our hiring process in any other way. Examples of such scams include purchasing a 'starter kit,' paying to apply, or purchasing equipment or training.

title: Business Analyst and Prompt Engineer Fashion Retail Domain
description:
Company Description

We are a consulting company with a bunch of technology-interested and happy people!

We love technology, we love design and we love quality. Our diversity makes us unique and creates an inclusive and welcoming workplace where each individual is highly valued.

With us, each individual is her/himself and respects others for who they are and we believe that when a fantastic mix of people gather and share their knowledge, experiences and ideas, we can help our customers on a completely different level.

We are looking for you who is immediate joiner and want to grow with us!

With us, you have great opportunities to take real steps in your career and the opportunity to take great responsibility.

Job Description:

We are seeking a highly skilled Business Analyst and Prompt Engineer with extensive domain experience in Fashion Retail. The ideal candidate should have expertise in LLMs, Multi-Agent GenAI Frameworks, Advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), and AI-powered agent workflows. You will play a key role in designing, refining, and optimizing agent workflows, prompts, and RAG systems to enhance agent interactions, ensure relevant outputs, create appropriate guardrails for GenAI generations, and maximize RAG efficiency.

Key Responsibilities:

Understand Business Requirements, Agent Roles and Limitations, Available Data, Data Structure, Company Internal Content, and Public Content.Analyze the Capabilities and Limitations of Multi-Agent Frameworks and LLMs.Design and Optimize Agent Workflows including creating agent role definitions, system prompts, and guardrails using prompting best practices.Optimize RAG for both Structured and Unstructured Data using a combination of structured queries and semantic search.Design Real-World Business Queries tailored for the Fashion Retail industry.Conduct A/B testing and evaluate workflow and prompt effectiveness using real-world business scenarios.Collaborate with Business Users to understand requirements and define use cases.Work closely with Developers, Data Analysts, AI Engineers, and Testers to integrate prompts into production workflows.Create User Guides and Training Programs to familiarize users with AI agents, best practices, and limitations.Collect User Feedback and incorporate it into agent workflows and prompts for continuous improvement.Manage Stakeholders by effectively communicating the capabilities and limitations of AI agents.Stay up-to-date with advancements in GenAI and industry best practices.


Qualifications:

5 to 10 years of relevant experience, preferably in Fashion Retail Domain.Proven experience in Business Analysis or Data Analytics.Hands-on experience with Multi-Agent GenAI Frameworks.Expertise in Prompt Engineering.Engineering/Professional Qualification/Masters from a reputed institute.Strong English Language Skills with the ability to communicate complex concepts clearly.Excellent Analytical and Problem-Solving Skills.


Why Join Us?

Opportunity to work with cutting-edge AI and GenAI technologies.Collaborate with a team of passionate and innovative professionals.Make a significant impact in the Fashion Retail industry through advanced AI solutions.Dynamic work environment with growth opportunities.


Start: Immediate

Location: Bangalore

Form of employment: Full-time until further notice, we apply 6 months probationary employment.

We interview candidates on an ongoing basis, do not wait to submit your application.

title: Prompt Engineer (m/w/d)
description:
Über Roomhero
Roomhero ist Vorreiter in der digitalen Transformation der Immobilienbranche und kombiniert Interior-Design mit modernster Technologie, um effiziente und stilvolle Wohn- und Arbeitsräume zu gestalten. Unser Ziel ist es, innovative Lösungen mit KI-Unterstützung zu entwickeln, um Prozesse zu optimieren und den Kunden ein einzigartiges Erlebnis zu bieten.
Deine Mission
Als Prompt Engineer (m/w/d) unterstützt du unser Unternehmen abteilungsübergreifend bei der Implementierung und Optimierung von künstlicher Intelligenz. Dein Fokus liegt darauf, KI-Modelle effizient zu nutzen, maßgeschneiderte Prompts zu entwickeln und innovative Automatisierungsstrategien zu entwerfen.
Aufgaben

Entwicklung und Optimierung von Prompts zur Steuerung generativer KI-Modelle (z. B. für Content-Erstellung, Datenanalyse, Kundenkommunikation).
Zusammenarbeit mit verschiedenen Abteilungen (Marketing, Vertrieb, Design, Produktentwicklung), um individuelle KI-gestützte Lösungen zu entwickeln.
Analyse und Anpassung von KI-Output zur Verbesserung der Ergebnisqualität und Effizienz.
Testen neuer KI-Technologien und Evaluierung ihres Nutzens für unser Unternehmen.
Erstellung von internen Best Practices und Schulungsmaterialien zur Nutzung von KI-Tools.

Qualifikation

Erfahrung in der Arbeit mit generativen KI-Tools 
Technisches Verständnis für Natural Language Processing (NLP) und maschinelles Lernen (ML) von Vorteil.
Kreatives und analytisches Denkvermögen, um präzise und zielgerichtete Prompts zu entwickeln.
Strukturierte, lösungsorientierte Arbeitsweise mit hohem Qualitätsanspruch.
Kommunikationsstärke und Begeisterung für neue Technologien.
Erfahrung mit Automatisierungstools und Skriptsprachen (z. B. Python, API-Integration) ist ein Plus.

Benefits

Innovatives Arbeitsumfeld: Arbeiten mit modernster KI-Technologie in einem dynamischen, wachstumsstarken Unternehmen.
Flexibilität: Remote-Option und flexible Arbeitszeiten.
Weiterentwicklung: Möglichkeit, neue KI-Technologien zu erforschen und maßgeblich an deren Implementierung mitzuwirken.
Abwechslungsreiche Aufgaben: Spannende Projekte mit unterschiedlichen Teams und Fachbereichen.

Bereit für die Zukunft mit KI?
Dann bewirb dich jetzt!

title: Prompt Engineer (m/w/d)
description:
Wir bei LVIT sind davon überzeugt, dass KI die Art & Weise, wie wir in Zukunft arbeiten, grundlegend verändern wird. Unsere Schwarm-KI-Plattform ermöglicht Unternehmen, ihre Arbeit intelligenter, effizienter und kreativer zu gestalten. Als Prompt Engineer spielst du eine Schlüsselrolle in dieser Mission: Du entwickelst präzise Prompts, die KI in ein leistungsfähiges Werkzeug verwandeln. Dein Antrieb? Die Grenzen des Möglichen zu verschieben und Unternehmen zu befähigen, die Kontrolle über ihre digitale Zukunft zu behalten.
Aufgaben
Deine Rolle: Du bist mehr als nur ein Entwickler – du bist ein Gestalter. Dein Fokus liegt auf der Entwicklung und Optimierung von KI-Prompts, die aus abstrakten Ideen präzise, nachvollziehbare und leistungsfähige KI-Interaktionen machen. Du trägst dazu bei, dass unsere Schwarm-KI nicht nur funktioniert, sondern begeistert.
Was du bei uns machst:

Du gestaltest mit uns die Zukunft der Arbeit
Entwickeln und Verfeinern von Prompts für verschiedene KI-Modelle, um optimale Antworten und Automatisierungen zu ermöglichen.
Experimentieren mit Prompt-Strategien, um Ergebnisse zu optimieren und innovative Anwendungen zu erschaffen.
Zusammenarbeit mit Entwicklern und Kunden, um maßgeschneiderte KI-Lösungen zu kreiren.
Analysieren von KI-Antworten, Identifizieren von Verbesserungspotenzialen und kontinuierliches Finetuning der Modelle.
Dokumentation von Best Practices und Aufbau von Wissen rund um effektives Prompt Engineering.

Qualifikation

Begeisterung für KI und ein tiefes Verständnis dafür, wie Sprachmodelle funktionieren.
Erfahrung im Schreiben, Testen und Optimieren von Prompts für unterschiedliche LLMs.
Ein analytisches und kreatives Mindset – du kannst Probleme aus verschiedenen Blickwinkeln betrachten und innovative Lösungen entwickeln.
Die Fähigkeit, komplexe Konzepte verständlich zu vermitteln – sowohl für Entwickler als auch für Nicht-Techniker.

Benefits

Purpose-getriebenes Arbeiten: Dein Job hat direkten Einfluss darauf, wie Unternehmen mit KI arbeiten und ihre Zukunft gestalten.
Gestaltungsfreiheit: Deine Ideen zählen – wir sind ein Team, das Innovation fördert und dir Raum gibt, Neues auszuprobieren.
Weiterentwicklung: Wir wachsen mit unseren Aufgaben. Du hast Zugang zu Wissen, Schulungen und kannst dich ständig weiterentwickeln.
Kultur, die inspiriert: Wir sind kein Unternehmen mit starren Strukturen, sondern ein Team von Visionären, die gemeinsam die Zukunft der Arbeit gestalten.

Wenn du Lust hast, die Zukunft der Arbeit aktiv mitzugestalten, dann melde dich bei uns! Kein kompliziertes Bewerbungsverfahren – ein kurzes Gespräch reicht, um zu sehen, ob wir zusammenpassen. Wir freuen uns darauf, dich kennenzulernen!

title: AI Prompt Engineer with LLM
description:
Skills:
Large Language Models (LLM), Artificial Intelligence (AI), Azure Ai, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Microsoft 365, Microsoft Copilot,

Job Description:**

We are on the lookout for an AI Engineer with LLMs who specializes in the Microsoft technology stack, with particular expertise in Azure OpenAI, Microsoft Copilot, and Power Virtual Agents. This role involves developing cutting-edge artificial intelligence solutions to enhance our business processes and customer interactions.

Key Responsibilities

 **AI Solution Development**: Design and implement AI models and solutions using Azure OpenAI, Microsoft Copilot, and Power Virtual Agents. Understand project requirements to develop strategies and create scalable, efficient AI solutions. **Collaboration and Integration**: Work closely with various teams to integrate AI solutions into existing systems. Ensure seamless incorporation of AI technologies with other Microsoft services and tools, including Microsoft 365 and Power Platform. **Expertise in Azure OpenAI and Microsoft Copilot**: Utilize Azure OpenAI for advanced AI capabilities and leverage Microsoft Copilot for AI-powered code generation and automation tasks. **Developing and Managing Virtual Agents**: Use Microsoft Power Virtual Agents to create sophisticated chatbots for automating customer service and internal workflows. **Continuous Learning and Innovation**: Stay updated with the latest in AI, machine learning, and Microsoft technologies, and apply these in developing innovative AI solutions. **Project Management and Documentation**: Oversee AI projects from start to finish, including planning, execution, and documentation, ensuring adherence to ethical AI practices.

Qualifications

 Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, AI, or related field. Proven experience in AI, machine learning, and data science. Strong programming skills in relevant languages. Proficiency in Azure AI services, Microsoft Copilot, and Power Virtual Agents. Experience in deploying enterprise-level AI solutions. Excellent problem-solving, communication, and collaboration skills.

Preferred Skills

 Certifications in Azure AI, Data Science, or related fields. Experience in NLP, computer vision, and machine learning frameworks. Familiarity with integrating AI solutions within the Microsoft Power Platform.

description:

Skills

A prompt engineer's job is to design, create, and optimize prompts for AI systems. They use a combination of technical skills, creative writing, and analytical thinking to do the following:

Develop prompts: Create prompts for text generation, translation, question answering, and creative writing Collaborate: Work with product teams, data scientists, and engineers to understand user needs Analyze data: Interpret data, evaluate prompt performance, and identify patterns Troubleshoot: Investigate and correct issues and bugs that may arise in AI prompt systems Communicate: Work effectively with other team members and stakeholders

Natural language processing (NLP)A deep understanding of NLP techniques is required to develop prompts that guide chatbots to respond to user input Inference efficiencyThis skill focuses on minimizing the time and resources required for an LLM to generate output based on prompts PortfolioA portfolio of AI prompts and how they were used to achieve valuable output can give prompt engineers an advantage in job applications Creating AI Influencers and making video with them

title: Senior Prompt Engineer (AI/ML)
description:

title: AI Prompt Engineer (Graduate)
description:
Graduate AI Prompt Engineer – Exciting Opportunity in AI & Automation

📍 Location: Ancoats, Manchester (5 days in the office)💼 Company: Core Tech Recruitment📅 Job Type: Full-Time, Permanent📈 Training Provided | Cutting-Edge AI | Business Development & Candidate Acquisition

Are you a tech-savvy graduate with a passion for AI?
Do you love experimenting with AI prompts, working with technologies like GPT, and exploring how automation can drive business success? If so, this is the perfect opportunity to kickstart your career!

At Core Tech Recruitment, we are hiring a Graduate AI Prompt Engineer to help us build and optimise AI-driven workflows using Clay.com. You don’t need prior experience with Clay – we’ll train you! This role is all about leveraging AI to enhance business development and candidate acquisition, playing a key role in how we operate as a recruitment agency.What You’ll Be Doing:• Designing, testing, and refining AI prompts for automation and outreach.• Working with GPT-powered AI models to extract and process information.• Learning how to build automated workflows using Clay.com.• Supporting business development by using AI to identify potential clients.• Helping to source and engage top-tier tech talent using AI-driven methods.• Undertaking structured training in AI, automation, and prompt engineering.

How to Apply:
If this sounds like your ideal opportunity, send your CV and a short cover letter explaining why you’re interested in AI and automation to info@coretechrecruitment.com.

🚀 Join us and be at the forefront of AI in recruitment! 🚀

title: Data Scientist Prompt Engineer
description:
Mercier Consultancy is seeking a talented Data Scientist Prompt Engineer to join our dynamic team. As an integral part of our organization, you will leverage your expertise in data science and artificial intelligence to develop and refine prompt engineering techniques that enhance the functionality and performance of our data-driven solutions. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement innovative models that meet the diverse needs of our clients while pushing the boundaries of technology. Your role will be pivotal in transforming complex data into actionable insights, and your creative input will assist in driving strategic decision-making processes. With us, you will have the opportunity to work on exciting projects that impact various industries, from technology and finance to healthcare and beyond.

We are looking for an external consultant who can help us to use new generative AI tools like ChatGPT and Microsoft Office CoPilot to improve our employee productivity and efficiency in our standard activities. The consultant will work with different business users from different parts of the bank, such as marketing, sales, and back office, and with different profiles, such as managers, project managers, sales people, etc.

Responsibilities

 Design and create the prompts that can elicit the best responses from the generative AI tools, using prompt engineering techniques and best practices Understand the business needs: Identify the use cases, the business need and scenarios where our generative AI tools can add value and solve problems Test and evaluate the quality and accuracy of the generative AI tools' outputs, using appropriate metrics and feedback mechanisms Train and coach the business users on how to use the generative AI tools effectively and responsibly and begin to set in place a prompt academy Document and communicate the results and learnings of the project

Requirements

Master's degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, or a related fieldProficiency in programming languages such as Python or RExperience with machine learning frameworks and prompt engineering techniquesStrong analytical and problem-solving capabilitiesExcellent communication skills, with the ability to convey complex concepts to non-technical audiencesKnowledge of data visualization tools and methodologiesYou have at least a Master’s degree in a quantitative discipline, such as statistics, mathematics, engineering (a PhD is considered an advantage) or MBA.Candidates with other academic backgrounds with substantial knowledge of prompt engineering technics are also encouraged to apply.Fluent in Dutch, French and English.Team player Quick self-starter, pro-active attitude  Good Communication and Influencing skills  Good analytical and synthesis skills  Autonomy, commitment and perseverance  Ability to work in a dynamic and multi-cultural environment Thinks out of the box outside existing processes and frameworks.Works with energy and empowerment to deliver great results and a large contribution to the company’s successConstructive by being open to the changes and to other’s opinions, ideas and feedback

Benefits

Competitive Monthly Salary

Working for a worldwide multinational

50% from home - 50% from location

And more....

title: Data Scientist Prompt Engineer
description:
Mercier Consultancy is seeking a talented Data Scientist Prompt Engineer to join our dynamic team. As an integral part of our organization, you will leverage your expertise in data science and artificial intelligence to develop and refine prompt engineering techniques that enhance the functionality and performance of our data-driven solutions. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement innovative models that meet the diverse needs of our clients while pushing the boundaries of technology. Your role will be pivotal in transforming complex data into actionable insights, and your creative input will assist in driving strategic decision-making processes. With us, you will have the opportunity to work on exciting projects that impact various industries, from technology and finance to healthcare and beyond.

We are looking for an external consultant who can help us to use new generative AI tools like ChatGPT and Microsoft Office CoPilot to improve our employee productivity and efficiency in our standard activities. The consultant will work with different business users from different parts of the bank, such as marketing, sales, and back office, and with different profiles, such as managers, project managers, sales people, etc.

Responsibilities

 Design and create the prompts that can elicit the best responses from the generative AI tools, using prompt engineering techniques and best practices Understand the business needs: Identify the use cases, the business need and scenarios where our generative AI tools can add value and solve problems Test and evaluate the quality and accuracy of the generative AI tools' outputs, using appropriate metrics and feedback mechanisms Train and coach the business users on how to use the generative AI tools effectively and responsibly and begin to set in place a prompt academy Document and communicate the results and learnings of the project


Requirements

Master's degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, or a related fieldProficiency in programming languages such as Python or RExperience with machine learning frameworks and prompt engineering techniquesStrong analytical and problem-solving capabilitiesExcellent communication skills, with the ability to convey complex concepts to non-technical audiencesKnowledge of data visualization tools and methodologiesYou have at least a Master's degree in a quantitative discipline, such as statistics, mathematics, engineering (a PhD is considered an advantage) or MBACandidates with other academic backgrounds with substantial knowledge of prompt engineering technics are also encouraged to applyFluent in Dutch, French and EnglishTeam player Quick self-starter, pro-active attitude  Good Communication and Influencing skills  Good analytical and synthesis skills  Autonomy, commitment and perseverance  Ability to work in a dynamic and multi-cultural environment Thinks out of the box outside existing processes and frameworksWorks with energy and empowerment to deliver great results and a large contribution to the company's successConstructive by being open to the changes and to other's opinions, ideas and feedback

Benefits

Competitive Monthly Salary

Working for a worldwide multinational

50% from home - 50% from location

And more....

title: Gen AI - Prompt Engineer
description:
Nous sommes

Chez Synechron, nous croyons en la puissance du numérique pour transformer les entreprises en mieux. Notre cabinet de conseil mondial combine la créativité et la technologie innovante pour offrir des solutions numériques de premier plan. Les technologies progressistes et les stratégies d'optimisation de Synechron couvrent l'intelligence artificielle, le conseil, le numérique, le cloud et DevOps, les données et l'ingénierie logicielle de bout en bout, au service d'une multitude d'entreprises de services financiers et de technologie renommées. Grâce à des initiatives de recherche et développement dans nos FinLabs, nous développons des solutions de modernisation, de l'intelligence artificielle et de la blockchain aux modèles de science des données, à la souscription numérique, aux applications mobiles de premier plan, et bien plus encore. Au cours des 20 dernières années, notre entreprise a été honorée de plusieurs distinctions d'employeur, reconnaissant notre engagement envers nos équipes talentueuses. Avec des clients de premier plan à notre actif, Synechron compte une main-d'œuvre mondiale de plus de +14,500 personnes et possède 58 bureaux dans 21 pays au sein des principaux marchés mondiaux.

Notre défi:

Nous recherchons un ingénieur en prompts Gen AI pratique pour rejoindre l'équipe/squad d'apprentissage machine. L'équipe travaille au développement de solutions d'intelligence artificielle, y compris l'apprentissage automatique (ML) et l'intelligence artificielle générative (Gen AI).

Informations Complémentaires

Le salaire de base pour ce poste variera en fonction de la géographie et d'autres facteurs. Conformément à la loi, le salaire de base pour ce poste s'il est pourvu à Montreal est de 100,000 $ CAD à 105,000 $/an et avantages sociaux (voir ci-dessous).

Responsabilités

Familier avec le développement Python et l'ingénierie des promptsTravailler avec différents clients/experts en la matière (SME) et comprendre les exigences commerciales pour l'ingénierie des prompts et le développement approprié de code PythonExpérience avec Open AI et différents modèles LLM, effectuer des tests et des évaluations de performanceFamilier avec la surveillance continueContribuer au développement et à la maintenance de la bibliothèque PythonContribuer au support de la bibliothèqueParticiper à l'ingénierie des promptsMaintenir les prompts et les mettre à jour avec les nouvelles versions de LLMEffectuer des tests réguliers et des analyses de performanceParticiper à des expériences de benchmark des prompts

Exigences :

Diplôme de premier cycle en informatique ou dans un domaine connexeAnnées d'expérience : 5+Expérience pratique dans la création d'applications PythonExcellentes compétences en ingénierie des promptsExcellentes compétences en développement PythonConnaissance des modèles de conception, de la résilience des systèmes, de l'observabilité, de l'évolutivité et de la performanceExpérience en développement AgileSolides compétences analytiques et passion pour la résolution de problèmesBonnes compétences en communicationRésidence à Montréal pour un modèle de travail hybride

Compétences souhaitées :

Expérience en apprentissage automatique, bases de données vectoriellesDéveloppement d'applications basées sur le cloud, de préférence en utilisant Microsoft Azure CloudExpérience antérieure dans le développement d'applications FinTechExposition au travail au sein d'une équipe de livraison mondiale

Nous pouvons vous offrir

Une organisation multinationale avec 58 bureaux dans 21 pays et la possibilité de travailler à l'étranger15 jours (3 semaines) de congés annuels payés plus 10 jours de congés personnels et jours de maladie supplémentairesUn régime d'assurance complet comprenant : assurance médicale, dentaire, visuelle, assurance vie et invalidité de longue duréeUne politique hybride flexible pour s'adapter à votre emploi du tempsREER avec contribution de l'employeur jusqu'à 4%Une politique de certification d'enseignement supérieurUdemy à la demande pour tous les employés de Synechron avec un accès gratuit à plus de 5000 cours sélectionnésPossibilités de coaching avec des collègues expérimentés de nos Laboratoires d'Innovation Financière (FinLabs) et de nos Groupes d'Excellence (CoE)Projets de pointe dans les principales banques de premier rang, les institutions financières et les compagnies d'assurance du monde entierUne culture de travail véritablement diversifiée, joyeuse et mondiale

DÉCLARATION DE DIVERSITÉ ET D'INCLUSION DE SYNECHRON

La diversité et l'inclusion sont fondamentales pour notre culture, et Synechron est fier d'être un lieu de travail égalitaire et un employeur pratiquant l'action positive. Notre initiative de diversité, d'équité et d'inclusion (DEI) «‘Synclusive’» s'engage à favoriser une culture inclusive - promouvoir l'égalité, la diversité et un environnement respectueux envers tous. Nous croyons fermement qu'une main-d'œuvre diversifiée contribue à renforcer les entreprises avec succès en tant qu'entreprise mondiale. Nous encourageons les candidats de divers horizons, qu'il s'agisse de race, d'origine ethnique, de religion, d'âge, de statut matrimonial, de genre, d'orientation sexuelle ou de handicap, à postuler. Nous autonomisons notre main-d'œuvre mondiale en proposant des arrangements de travail flexibles, du mentorat, une mobilité interne, des programmes d'apprentissage et de développement, et bien plus encore.

Toutes les décisions d'emploi chez Synechron sont basées sur les besoins de l'entreprise, les exigences du poste et les qualifications individuelles, sans tenir compte du genre, de l'identité de genre, de l'orientation sexuelle, de la race, de l'origine ethnique, du handicap ou du statut de vétéran du candidat, ou de toute autre caractéristique protégée par la loi.

We are

At Synechron, we believe in the power of digital to transform businesses for the better. Our global consulting firm combines creativity and innovative technology to deliver industry-leading digital solutions. Synechron’s progressive technologies and optimization strategies span end-to-end Artificial Intelligence, Consulting, Digital, Cloud & DevOps, Data, and Software Engineering, servicing an array of noteworthy financial services and technology firms. Through research and development initiatives in our FinLabs we develop solutions for modernization, from Artificial Intelligence and Blockchain to Data Science models, Digital Underwriting, mobile-first applications and more. Over the last 20+ years, our company has been honored with multiple employer awards, recognizing our commitment to our talented teams. With top clients to boast about, Synechron has a global workforce of 14,500+, and has 58 offices in 21 countries within key global markets.

Our challenge

We are looking for a hands-on Gen AI Prompt Engineer to join the Machine Learning team/squad. The team is working on developing Artificial Intelligence solutions including ML and Gen AI.

Additional Information

The base salary for this position will vary based on geography and other factors. In accordance with law, the base salary for this role if filled within Montreal is CAD $100k – CAD $105k/year & benefits (see below).

The Role

Responsibilities:

Familiar with Python development and prompt engineeringWork with different Clients/SME’s and understand business requirements for prompt engineering and proper python code developmentExperience with Open AI and different LLM models, conduct testing and performance evaluation familiar with ongoing monitoringContribute to development and maintenance of the python libraryContribute to the support of the libraryParticipate in prompt engineeringMaintain the prompts and keep them up to date with the new LLM versionsConduct regular testing and performance analysisParticipate in prompt benchmarking experiments

Requirements:

You are:

Bachelor’s in computer science or related fieldYears of experience: 5+Hands-on experience in building python applicationsExcellent prompt engineering skillsExcellent Python development skillsKnowledge of design patterns, system resiliency, observability, scalability and performanceExperience of Agile developmentStrong analytical skills and passion for problem-solvingGood communication skillsLocated in Montreal for hybrid work model

Skills Desired:

Experience with machine learning, vector databasesCloud-based application development preferably using Microsoft Azure CloudPrior experience in FinTech application developmentExposure to working in a global delivery team

We can offer you:

A multinational organization with 58 offices in 21 countries and the possibility to work abroad  15 days (3 weeks) of paid annual leave plus an additional 10 days of personal leave (floating days and sick days) A comprehensive insurance plan including medical, dental, vision, life insurance, and long-term disability Flexible hybrid policy to fit your schedule  RRSP with employer’s contribution up to 4%  A higher education certification policy  On-demand Udemy for Business for all Synechron employees with free access to more than 5000 curated courses  Coaching opportunities with experienced colleagues from our Financial Innovation Labs (FinLabs) and Center of Excellences (CoE) groups  Cutting edge projects at the world’s leading tier-one banks, financial institutions and insurance firms  A truly diverse, fun-loving and global work culture  

S YNECHRON’S DIVERSITY & INCLUSION STATEMENT

Diversity & Inclusion are fundamental to our culture, and Synechron is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. Our Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) initiative ‘Same Difference’ is committed to fostering an inclusive culture – promoting equality, diversity and an environment that is respectful to all. We strongly believe that a diverse workforce helps build stronger, successful businesses as a global company. We encourage applicants from across diverse backgrounds, race, ethnicities, religion, age, marital status, gender, sexual orientations, or disabilities to apply. We empower our global workforce by offering flexible workplace arrangements, mentoring, internal mobility, learning and development programs, and more.

All employment decisions at Synechron are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to the applicant’s gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, disabled or veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

description:

title: Legal Prompt Engineer
description:

title: AI Prompt Engineer & Python Developer
description:
Description

We are looking for a Python Developer with strong AI prompt engineering skills to build intelligent automation tools for our SaaS platform. This role goes beyond traditional software development—you will be responsible for:

 Extracting structured data from our databases  Crafting optimized prompts using that data for OpenAI’s API  Retrieving and processing AI-generated insights  Building automated workflows to integrate these insights at scale 


 This role is ideal for someone who understands both data engineering and AI communication—leveraging structured data to create effective prompts that yield high-quality AI responses.   Primary Responsibilities/Essential Functions 

 AI Prompt Engineering & Optimization  Design, test, and refine prompts for OpenAI’s API to ensure accuracy, relevance, and structured outputs  Develop dynamic prompts that adapt to different product categories, business rules, and warehouse conditions  Apply techniques like few-shot learning, chain-of-thought prompting, and contextual prompting to improve AI performance  Debug and iterate on AI-generated responses to reduce hallucinations and improve consistency  Data Retrieval, Processing & Structuring  Connect to and query SQL/NoSQL databases to retrieve millions of product records and warehouse data  Clean, transform, and structure data before passing it to OpenAI’s API  Ensure high data integrity for AI-driven insights  API Integration & Workflow Automation  Integrate OpenAI’s API with structured data sources for real-time and batch processing  Automate large-scale AI-powered workflows to handle high volumes of data interactions  Design error-handling and retry mechanisms for reliable API integration  Scalability & Performance Optimization  Build high-performance, scalable data pipelines to process AI results efficiently  Optimize prompt response times and API cost efficiency  Use caching (e.g., Redis) and parallel processing to enhance performance  Collaboration & Documentation  Work closely with data engineers, product teams, and AI specialists to integrate AI-driven insights  Document workflows, code, and prompt strategies for maintainability and optimization 


Qualifications

 Python Expertise – 3-5 years of experience with Python for data handling, API interactions, and automation  Database Querying – Strong SQL & NoSQL skills for retrieving and structuring large datasets  OpenAI API & LLM Experience – Experience or strong interest in working with OpenAI’s API (GPT models) and prompt engineering  AI Prompt Optimization – Understanding of how to structure AI prompts for clarity, accuracy, and efficiency  API Integration & Automation – Experience in RESTful API interactions and processing structured responses  Data Processing & Transformation – Proficiency in pandas, numpy for cleaning and preparing data before AI inference  Scalability & Performance Optimization – Familiarity with asynchronous programming, parallel processing, caching  Version Control & CI/CD – Hands-on experience with Git, Docker, CI/CD pipelines 


Preferred Skills

 Experience fine-tuning OpenAI models or custom LLM deployment  Hands-on experience with big data tools (e.g., Snowflake, BigQuery, Databricks)  Familiarity with asynchronous processing (asyncio, Celery) for high-volume API calls  Experience in pricing automation & AI-powered decision-making

title: AI Prompt Engineer
description:
The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of natural language processing (NLP), machine learning, and AI model behaviour. The candidate will be responsible for designing, testing, and optimizing prompts to improve the performance and accuracy of AI systems, particularly in generative models like GPT, BERT, and others.

Key Responsibilities:

Prompt Design and Optimization:  Develop and refine prompts to elicit desired responses from AI models.  Test and iterate on prompt designs to improve model performance across various tasks.  Model Evaluation:  Evaluate the effectiveness of prompts in achieving specific outcomes.  Analyze model outputs to identify areas for improvement and adjust prompts accordingly.  Cross-Functional Collaboration:  Work closely with stakeholders across the business to understand user needs and translate them into effective prompts.  Provide insights and recommendations based on prompt performance  Stay and Innovation:  Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in NLP and AI prompt engineering.  Experiment with new techniques and approaches to enhance prompt effectiveness.  Documentation and Knowledge Sharing:  Document best practices and guidelines for prompt engineering.  Share knowledge and mentor team members on prompt design and optimization techniques. 

Experience:

 Proven experience in NLP, machine learning, or AI model development.  Hands-on experience with generative AI models (e.g., GPT, BERT) and prompt engineering.  Familiarity with AI frameworks and tools 

Skills:

 Strong understanding of language models and their behaviour.  Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.  Proficiency in programming languages such as Python.  Strong communication and collaboration skills.

title: Prompt Engineer
description:
Job Title: DataOps & Prompt EngineerLocation: Bangalore (On-site)Job Type: Full-time
About Us:Nurix.ai is at the forefront of AI innovation, delivering cutting-edge AI and LLM solutions to enhance productivity and automation. Backed by $27.5M in seed funding, we are building AI-driven products that redefine human-machine collaboration. We are looking for a DataOps and Prompt Engineer to join our team and help optimize AI interactions for real-world applications.
Position Overview:We are seeking a Data Operations & Prompt Engineer who will be responsible for designing, testing, and optimizing prompts to enhance AI model performance while also preparing, cleaning, and maintaining the datasets that power our machine learning models. You will work closely with our AI research, product, and engineering teams to develop structured prompts that improve the accuracy, relevance, and efficiency of AI-generated responses. Additionally, you will leverage Large Language Models (LLMs) for data generation and augmentation, gaining expertise in prompt engineering and data curation.
Key Responsibilities:Develop and refine structured prompts to optimize AI model outputs, experimenting with various prompting techniquesWork on client demos, leveraging Nurix’s platformsAnalyze AI responses, troubleshoot inconsistencies, and fine-tune prompts for better accuracy while researching and implementing best practices to reduce hallucinations and biasesAutomate workflows by designing prompts for AI agents, chatbots, and AI-powered assistants, collaborating with data scientists, engineers, and product teams to integrate AI-driven solutions into real-world applicationsBuild a prompting framework and analytics dashboard for quick validation of various promptsStay updated with advancements in NLP, LLMs, and generative AI to continuously improve prompt strategies and enhance AI model performanceAssist in curating, cleaning, and processing datasets used for training machine learning models, including analyzing audio data from customer call conversationsIdentify and tag key segments in call recordings for ML training purposes, applying best practices in data quality assurance, validation, and annotation for both text and audio dataCollaborate with ML engineers to understand data requirements and specifications, develop and maintain documentation for data processing workflows, and establish standardized procedures for audio data processing.Learn to create effective prompts for LLMs to generate and augment datasets while helping identify and resolve data quality issues across various data types.Participate in regular team meetings to discuss data needs, challenges, and improvements in data curation and processing strategies.
Qualifications and Skills:Education: BTech, BE, or equivalent experienceExperience: 2-4 years of experience in prompt engineering, AI model interaction, NLP, data operations, or related fields.Technical Skills:Experience working with LLMs (GPT, Claude, Gemini, Llama, etc.) and AI APIs.Familiarity with Python, OpenAI API, LangChain, and AI automation frameworks (preferred but not mandatory).Understanding of NLP principles, model behavior, and prompt design techniques.Proficiency in Microsoft Excel, including formulas and data manipulation.Basic understanding of data structures, formats, and SQL.Analytical & Problem-Solving Skills:Strong attention to detail and data accuracy.Ability to interpret AI-generated outputs and optimize performance.Strong problem-solving abilities and analytical mindset.Soft Skills:Strong writing and communication skills, with a keen understanding of AI-driven content generation.Excellent organizational and documentation skills.Adaptability to a fast-paced AI startup environment.
Bonus Skills (Nice to Have):Experience with vector databases, embeddings, and AI fine-tuning.Knowledge of AI safety, bias mitigation, and explainability techniques.Hands-on experience with LLM-based chatbots or AI-driven productivity tools.Willingness to learn Python, SQL, and other AI-related technologies.
Why Join Nurix.ai?Work on cutting-edge AI products that shape the future of productivity.

title: Prompt Engineer for AI Employees
description:
Job Opening: Prompt Engineer for AI Employees
Binom AI is a ready-to-use infrastructure for creating and integrating AI employees into businesses. Our AI employees—Sales Manager, Social Media Manager, HR, Supervisor, Tech Support, and more—are already working successfully.
To further improve our AI employees, we need expertise in prompt engineering. We use Gemini, OpenAI, DeepSeek, Azure, and other AI models.We are looking for a specialist who can help us find the right balance between prompts, data processing algorithms, and integration with external services (telephony, social media, databases, etc.).
🔥 What you will do:Develop and optimize prompts for different AI models.Find the best balance between prompts, data processing algorithms, and integrations.Work with developers to create solutions that combine AI, API integrations, and business logic.Help improve existing AI employees and develop new ones.Ensure secure and stable communication with AI models.💡 Who we are looking for:A specialist with deep understanding of LLMs (OpenAI, Gemini, DeepSeek, etc.).An expert in prompt design and optimization for real business cases.Someone who understands basic programming principles and API integrations.A practical person who can quickly adapt and bring real value to our team.Our system is already working with real clients and demand, and we need someone who can make us stronger in prompt engineering.📩 If this sounds like you, contact us! We are open to discussion and collaboration!

title: Prompt Engineer
description:
Job Description: Prompt Engineer

Overview

We are seeking a highly skilled and creative Prompt Engineer to join our innovative team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing, optimizing, and maintaining AI-driven prompts to enhance user interactions and improve the overall efficiency of our AI systems.

Key Responsibilities

  Design and Develop Prompts: Create and refine prompts that effectively guide users in interacting with AI systems to ensure accurate and relevant responses.  Optimization: Continuously analyze and improve prompt performance to enhance user experience and operational efficiency.  Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, software developers, and UX designers, to align prompt strategies with business objectives.  Testing and Evaluation: Conduct rigorous testing and evaluation of prompts to ensure their functionality and effectiveness in real-world scenarios.  Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation of prompt development processes, methodologies, and best practices.  Stay Updated: Keep abreast of the latest advancements in AI and NLP technologies to integrate new techniques and approaches into prompt engineering.

Requirements

  Education: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.  Experience: Proven experience in AI, NLP, or related areas, with a focus on prompt engineering or conversational AI.  Technical Skills: Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, and familiarity with AI/ML frameworks and tools.  Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and address prompt performance issues.  Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills to articulate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.  Attention to Detail: High level of attention to detail and accuracy in prompt design and evaluation.  Creativity: Ability to think creatively and develop innovative solutions to complex challenges.

Preferred Qualifications

  Advanced Degree: Ph.D. in a relevant field is a plus.  Industry Experience: Experience working in a tech-driven environment or with consumer-facing AI products.  Project Management: Experience in project management and working in agile development environments.  Certifications: Relevant certifications in AI, ML, or NLP.

title: GenAI Prompt Engineer
description:
Position: Power Platform DeveloperLocation: Montreal-HybridFull time
Qualifications
Primary Responsibilities
The developer will be working within a machine learning team/squad. The team is working on developing Artificial Intelligence solutions including ML and Gen AI. The candidate should be familiar with python development and prompt engineering. The candidate should be able to work with different Clients/SME’s and understand the business requirements for prompt engineeringand proper python code development. Experience with Open AI and different LLM models, conduct testing and performance evaluation is required. Good candidate should be familiar with ongoing monitoring.· Contribute to development and maintenance of the python library.· Contribute to the support of the library.· Participate in prompt engineering.· Maintain the prompts and keep them up to date with the new LLM versions· Conduct regular testing and performance analysis.· Participate in prompt benchmarking experiments.
Skills Required
- Bachelor’s in computer science or related field - Years of experience: 5+ - Hands-on experience in building python applications - Excellent prompt engineering skills - Excellent Python development skills - Knowledge of design patterns, system resiliency, observability, scalability and performance - Experience of Agile development- Strong analytical skills and passion for problem-solving - Good communication skills
Skills Desired
- Experience with machine learning, vector databases - Cloud-based application development preferably using Microsoft Azure Cloud - Prior experience in FinTech application development - Exposure to working in a global delivery team

title: Prompt Engineer
description:
Job Title: Prompt Engineer

Location: New York, NY; Boston, MA; Remote Considered

About The Company

Our client is a leader in the insurance industry, committed to innovation and transformation. We are focused on streamlining complex processes, leveraging AI and machine learning to enhance efficiency and decision-making. Our team values collaboration, technical excellence, and continuous learning.

Job Summary

We are looking for a Prompt Engineer to drive key workstreams focused on insurance transformation initiatives. The ideal candidate has experience in the insurance domain, particularly in group benefits (e.g., underwriting, disability and dental insurance), and can accelerate the onboarding process. This role requires hands-on expertise in large language models (LLMs), generative AI (GenAI), Prompt Engineering, and ETL pipelines for unstructured data. You will be responsible for developing solutions that streamline processes such as RFP evaluation and quoting, significantly reducing turnaround time.

This is a 3-4 month contract role, with potential for contract-to-hire based on performance and value addition.

Key Responsibilities

Lead and own data science workstreams to drive AI-powered transformation in the insurance domain.Develop and optimize ETL pipelines for unstructured data stored in AWS S3, utilizing Amazon Bedrock, OpenAI models, and other LLM capabilities.Enhance RFP processing automation, reducing the turnaround time for quote generation from weeks to days.Build and deploy AI-driven document extraction models, integrating structured and unstructured data for improved decision-making.Work with cross-functional teams, including underwriters, sales, account managers, and case installation teams, to ensure AI solutions align with business needs.Improve legacy system workflows, migrating processes to modern cloud-based solutions.Optimize multi-API pipelines for GenAI and LLM applications, leveraging prompt engineering and multiple API calls.Collaborate with data engineers to enhance existing structured data pipelines and incorporate advanced AI models.Stay updated on emerging AI/ML technologies, bringing innovative solutions to the team.

Requirements

Education: Master’s degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, or related field (preferred but not required).Experience: 5+ years of hands-on experience in data science, AI/ML, or related roles.Industry Background: Ideal candidates will have a strong understanding of the insurance domain, preferably in group benefits and underwriting. Insurance experience preferred but not required.Technical Skills:Must Haves:Prompt Engineering (LLMs and/or GenAI)Building out unstructured ETL pipelinesWorking closely with open APIsS3 AWS CloudAbility to manage a project workload independentlyNice to Haves:Amazon BedrockInsurance Industry experience (Underwriting experience)Brings something unique to the team (e.g., building an ETL for unstructured data)Master’s degreeSoft Skills:Ability to drive workstreams independently and deliver results.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to bring innovative solutions to the team.Ability to collaborate with multi-disciplinary teams and work in a fast-paced environment.
Logistics

Onsite (hybrid) in NYC or BostonMust be able to hit the ground running within two weeksPossible Contract-to-Hire (C2H) opportunity

Benefits

Competitive Compensation for contract and potential full-time conversion.Flexible Work Arrangements, including remote options (preference for NY or Boston-based candidates).Competitive Health Benefits for contractorsExposure to Cutting-Edge AI Technologies in a real-world insurance application.

title: Gen AI  Prompt Engineer
description:
Position: Software Engineer / Gen AI + Prompt Engineer

Location: Austin, TX (Hybrid Work )

Role Overview: We are seeking skilled Software Engineers to join our team for the LLM App Red-Teaming project. The ideal candidates will have experience in prompt engineering and familiarity with LLM Apps and RAG systems. Knowledge of automated red-teaming solutions such as PyRIT, Garak, and Giskard is a significant advantage.

Key Responsibilities

Develop and implement software solutions for LLM App Red-Teaming.Participate in and support reviews with IS&T internal groups. Conduct testing at various stages of the project. Provide production cutover and warranty support. Ensure all relevant SDLC artifacts are included in the project response. 

Required Skills And Experience

Prompt Engineering: At least 1 year of experience (Required) GenAI Red-Teaming: Experience is a plus (Nice to Have) 

Additional Comments

Familiarity with automated red-teaming solutions like PyRIT, Garak, Giskard, etc., is a big plus. Must be proficient in Prompt Engineering and familiar with LLM Apps & RAG systems.

title: AI Content Prompt Engineer
description:
About Us

Ruby Labs is a leading tech company that creates and operates innovative consumer products. We offer a diverse range of opportunities across the health, education, and entertainment industries. Our innovative teams are driving the future of consumer-led products, and we're always looking for passionate individuals to join us. Learn more about our story at: https://rubylabs.com/about-us/

About The Role

We are seeking an experienced and talented AI Prompt Engineer to join our Ad Labs team at Ruby Labs. This full-time role is crucial for scaling our ad production using AI tools for video and image generation. You will report directly to the Ad Creative Director and collaborate closely with our creative and technical teams to develop innovative advertising creatives.

Key Responsibilities

AI Creative Leadership: Oversee the use of AI tools to produce ad creatives (static images and videos), enhancing scalability and efficiency. Lead the entire AI-generated creative process from concept to execution. Strategic Collaboration: Partner with the Ad Creative Director and creative teams to transform advertising concepts into high-quality, ready-to-launch AI-generated visuals and videos. Innovative Development: Remain at the cutting edge of AI technology, proactively exploring and integrating new tools and methods to elevate ad quality and streamline production processes. Performance Optimization: Continuously monitor and analyze the effectiveness of AI-generated ads, utilizing performance data to drive creative improvements and report on outcomes. 

Qualifications

Experience: At least 1 year of experience in an AI-focused role, bonus points if it is within the advertising or creative industry. Technical Skills: Proficient with AI content generation tools like Sora AI, Midjourney, Runway, Arcads, ElevenLabs, Pika AI, ChatGPT, among others. Strong understanding of the advertising production process. Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, AI, Marketing, or related field preferred. Portfolio: Must submit a portfolio showcasing past projects with AI tools, ideally related to advertising. 

Location

Ruby Labs operates within the CET (Central European Time) zone. Applicants from any country are welcome to apply for the position as long as they are located within approximately ± 4 hours of CET. This ensures optimal collaboration and communication during working hours.

Benefits

Discover the perks of being part of our vibrant team! We offer:

Remote Work Environment: Embrace the freedom to work from anywhere, anytime, promoting a healthy work-life balance. 🏡⏰Unlimited PTO: Enjoy unlimited paid time off to recharge and prioritize your well-being, without counting days. 🌴💼Paid National Holidays: Celebrate and relax on national holidays with paid time off to unwind and recharge. 🎉🌟Company-provided MacBook: Experience seamless productivity with top-notch Apple MacBooks provided to all employees who need them. 💻🚀Flexible Independent Contractor Agreement: Unlock the benefits of flexibility, autonomy, and entrepreneurial opportunities. Benefit from tax advantages, networking opportunities, reduced employment obligations, and the freedom to work from anywhere. Read more about it here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1dHF4ctKlez75whdn-ybUwP5d5Wr0BdwVrorrm_fM40Q/preview 📈💼

Be part of our fast-growing team and seize this excellent opportunity for personal and professional growth!

Interview Process

Application Submission: Provide your CV along with a portfolio showcasing a variety of AI-generated projects. Recruiter Screening (30 minutes): Discuss your background, experience, and fit for the role. Task Assignment: Demonstrate your skills with AI tools through a practical task related to ad production. Final Interview (60 minutes): Meet with the Ad Creative Director and CEO to discuss your vision for the role and potential impact at Ruby Labs. 

Life at Ruby Labs

At Ruby Labs, we are more than a team; we're a community united in pushing the boundaries of technology and innovation. Our combined passion fuels our ambition for excellence, driving impact that resonates around the globe.

We are an equal-opportunity employer and celebrate diversity, recognizing that a diversity of thought and backgrounds builds stronger teams. We approach diversity and inclusion seriously and thoughtfully. We do not discriminate based on race, ethnicity, religion, color, place of birth, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, military service status, or disability status. Join us and be part of a company that is crafting the future of technology across multiple industries.

title: AI Content Prompt Engineer
description:
About Us

Ruby Labs is a leading tech company that creates and operates innovative consumer products. We offer a diverse range of opportunities across the health, education, and entertainment industries. Our innovative teams are driving the future of consumer-led products, and we're always looking for passionate individuals to join us. Learn more about our story at: https://rubylabs.com/about-us/

About The Role

We are seeking an experienced and talented AI Prompt Engineer to join our Ad Labs team at Ruby Labs. This full-time role is crucial for scaling our ad production using AI tools for video and image generation. You will report directly to the Ad Creative Director and collaborate closely with our creative and technical teams to develop innovative advertising creatives.

Key Responsibilities

AI Creative Leadership: Oversee the use of AI tools to produce ad creatives (static images and videos), enhancing scalability and efficiency. Lead the entire AI-generated creative process from concept to execution. Strategic Collaboration: Partner with the Ad Creative Director and creative teams to transform advertising concepts into high-quality, ready-to-launch AI-generated visuals and videos. Innovative Development: Remain at the cutting edge of AI technology, proactively exploring and integrating new tools and methods to elevate ad quality and streamline production processes. Performance Optimization: Continuously monitor and analyze the effectiveness of AI-generated ads, utilizing performance data to drive creative improvements and report on outcomes. 

Qualifications

Experience: At least 1 year of experience in an AI-focused role, bonus points if it is within the advertising or creative industry. Technical Skills: Proficient with AI content generation tools like Sora AI, Midjourney, Runway, Arcads, ElevenLabs, Pika AI, ChatGPT, among others. Strong understanding of the advertising production process. Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, AI, Marketing, or related field preferred. Portfolio: Must submit a portfolio showcasing past projects with AI tools, ideally related to advertising. 

Location

Ruby Labs operates within the CET (Central European Time) zone. Applicants from any country are welcome to apply for the position as long as they are located within approximately ± 4 hours of CET. This ensures optimal collaboration and communication during working hours.

Benefits

Discover the perks of being part of our vibrant team! We offer:

Remote Work Environment: Embrace the freedom to work from anywhere, anytime, promoting a healthy work-life balance. 🏡⏰Unlimited PTO: Enjoy unlimited paid time off to recharge and prioritize your well-being, without counting days. 🌴💼Paid National Holidays: Celebrate and relax on national holidays with paid time off to unwind and recharge. 🎉🌟Company-provided MacBook: Experience seamless productivity with top-notch Apple MacBooks provided to all employees who need them. 💻🚀Flexible Independent Contractor Agreement: Unlock the benefits of flexibility, autonomy, and entrepreneurial opportunities. Benefit from tax advantages, networking opportunities, reduced employment obligations, and the freedom to work from anywhere. Read more about it here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1dHF4ctKlez75whdn-ybUwP5d5Wr0BdwVrorrm_fM40Q/preview 📈💼

Be part of our fast-growing team and seize this excellent opportunity for personal and professional growth!

Application Submission: Provide your CV along with a portfolio showcasing a variety of AI-generated projects. Recruiter Screening (30 minutes): Discuss your background, experience, and fit for the role. Task Assignment: Demonstrate your skills with AI tools through a practical task related to ad production. Final Interview (60 minutes): Meet with the Ad Creative Director and CEO to discuss your vision for the role and potential impact at Ruby Labs. 

Life at Ruby Labs

title: AI Prompt Engineer
description:
Join Our Team at 411 Locals: AI Prompt EngineerAre you passionate about artificial intelligence and eager to make a significant impact on the future of AI tools? 411 Locals is looking for a creative and analytical AI Prompt Engineer to join our innovative team. In this role, you will be responsible for crafting, iterating, and optimizing text prompts for large language models (LLMs) and other AI systems, ensuring they deliver high-performance results across various applications.If you have a deep understanding of language, AI, and the art of communicating effectively with machines, this is the opportunity for you!
Key Responsibilities:Prompt Design & Development: Create clear, effective, and concise prompts that elicit desired outputs from LLMs and other AI systems.Iteration & Optimization: Continuously analyze and refine prompts to enhance relevance, coherence, and precision. Conduct A/B testing to find the most effective prompting strategies.Research & Innovation: Stay up-to-date with advancements in AI, particularly in LLMs and prompt engineering techniques. Explore new strategies to enhance AI interaction.Collaboration & Communication: Work with developers, data scientists, and other stakeholders to align AI solutions with user and business requirements. Communicate technical concepts clearly to both technical and non-technical teams.Data Management: Collect and analyze data related to AI responses and prompt performance to guide ongoing optimization efforts.Training: Help train non-technical team members on how to use prompts effectively in their workflows.
Qualifications:Education: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, linguistics, data science, or a related field (Master's or PhD is a plus).Experience: 2+ years of experience working with AI systems, LLMs, or NLP. Hands-on experience with prompt engineering and platforms like LangChain or OpenAI is highly desirable.Skills: Strong understanding of language and semantics, proficiency in prompt engineering techniques (e.g., few-shot learning, chain-of-thought prompting), excellent communication skills, and strong analytical abilities. Familiarity with data analysis and visualization is a plus.Research: A strong interest in staying current on AI advancements and experimenting with new approaches.Collaboration: A team-oriented mindset with the ability to work across departments and share knowledge with others.
This is an exciting opportunity to be part of an innovative team at the forefront of AI technology. If you are driven by the potential of AI and have the skills to unlock its full potential, we want to hear from you!
Apply now to join 411 Locals as an AI Prompt Engineer and help shape the future of AI-driven solutions.
Note: We value diversity and encourage applicants from all backgrounds to apply.

title: Prompt Engineer (AI/ML) - 3+ yrs - Immediate
description:
Job Summary 
We are looking for a creative and highly skilled Prompt Engineer with 3-4 years of experience to join our client's AI/ML team. As a Prompt Engineer, you will be responsible for designing and optimizing prompts that enhance the performance of large language models (LLMs) and other AI models. Your role will focus on improving model responses, creating innovative solutions, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deploy AI-driven applications. 
Job Responsibilities:● Design, test, and refine prompts to optimize the performance of AI/ML models, especially large language models (LLMs). ● Collaborate with AI teams to understand model behavior and improve response generation. ● Develop and implement prompt engineering strategies for various use cases, including chatbots, virtual assistants, and other AI applications. ● Research and apply prompt engineering best practices to enhance AI model outputs. ● Continuously experiment with different prompt structures to maximize relevance and accuracy. ● Analyze model outputs and use insights to adjust and improve prompts. ● Work closely with data scientists, engineers, and product teams to integrate prompt engineering into product development. ● Keep up to date with advancements in AI/ML, particularly in LLMs, generative AI, and natural language processing (NLP). 
Candidate Profile: ● Bachelor's degree in Engineering (BE/B.Tech-CS/IT) or a Master's degree in Computer Applications (MCA) or an equivalent qualification. ● 3-4 years of experience working with AI/ML models, with a focus on prompt engineering or related areas. Candidate Required Skills: ● Strong knowledge of large language models (LLMs) such as GPT, BERT, and other NLP models. ● Proficiency in natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning techniques. ● Expertise in prompt design and fine-tuning model responses for AI-powered applications. ● Familiarity with programming languages such as Python and experience with AI/ML frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Hugging Face). ● Strong analytical skills to evaluate model performance and improve prompt effectiveness. ● Creative problem-solving skills and critical thinking about model outputs. ● Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work within cross-functional teams.

title: Prompt engineer (Gen AI Developer)
description:
Looking for a skilled AI Python Developer to join the AEGIS team developing a framework for enabling AI and Generative AI capabilities for the organization.
Position - AI Python DeveloperQualifications- Master's degree in Data Science with specialized experience in Generative AI patterns and technologies.- Deep understanding of Prompt Engineering and Agentic workflows using Langchain, Langgraph, Autogen, and Semantic Kernel.- Proficiency in C#, Python, and Angular.- Experience with Large Language Models (LLM) such as Azure OpenAI, Mistral.AI, and Google's VertexAI & Gemini.- Familiar with SCRUM and Agile development methodologies and technologies.- Experience with DevOPs tooling like Azure DevOps & GitHub, and the SDLC processes.
Responsibilities- Software development in C# and Python implementing GenAI Digital Assistants, SDKs - Research emerging AI and Generative AI technologies - complete Proof-of-concepts and provide recommendations including Architecture Decision reports on how and when to use specific patterns.- Author Reference Architectures for implementing Agentic Workflow patterns using our frameworks
Ideal Candidate- Thrives in a dynamic and innovative environment.- Self-starter and open to challenges.- Experienced in working in a corporate environment- Experienced id working on a Software Development team

title: Prompt Engineer
description:
The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of natural language processing (NLP), machine learning, and AI model behaviour. The candidate will be responsible for designing, testing, and optimizing prompts to improve the performance and accuracy of AI systems, particularly in generative models like GPT, BERT, and others.
Key Responsibilities:
1.Prompt Design and Optimization:- Develop and refine prompts to elicit desired responses from AI models.- Test and iterate on prompt designs to improve model performance across various tasks.
2. Model Evaluation:- Evaluate the effectiveness of prompts in achieving specific outcomes.- Analyze model outputs to identify areas for improvement and adjust prompts accordingly.
3. Cross-Functional Collaboration:- Work closely with stakeholders across the business to understand user needs and translate them into effective prompts.- Provide insights and recommendations based on prompt performance
4. Stay and Innovation:- Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in NLP and AI prompt engineering.- Experiment with new techniques and approaches to enhance prompt effectiveness.
5. Documentation and Knowledge Sharing:- Document best practices and guidelines for prompt engineering.- Share knowledge and mentor team members on prompt design and optimization techniques.
Experience:- Proven experience in NLP, machine learning, or AI model development.- Hands-on experience with generative AI models (e.g., GPT, BERT) and prompt engineering.- Familiarity with AI frameworks and tools
Skills:- Strong understanding of language models and their behaviour.- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.- Proficiency in programming languages such as Python.- Strong communication and collaboration skills.

title: We Are Hiring: AI Agent Chain & Prompt Engineer (Onsite – Ahmedabad)
description:
Company DescriptionArsenalTech is a dynamic offshore software and web development company that transforms ideas into realities for clients worldwide. Our team is energetic and youthful, equipped with cutting-edge infrastructure to create custom web and mobile applications. Our expertise spans various sectors including healthcare, e-commerce, real estate, and fintech, among others. As a one-stop shop, we offer all-in-one solutions from design to project management, tailored to fit client goals.
As an AI Agent Chain & Prompt Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining AI models and algorithms. Your daily tasks will include:
Writing and testing code for AI-driven solutionsImplementing machine learning algorithms and developing prompt engineering strategiesDeveloping and optimizing AI agent workflows using LangChain & LlamaIndexEnhancing AI responses with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) for real-time knowledge retrievalIntegrating AI models via OpenAI, Hugging Face, Google Vertex AICollaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure project goals are metContinuous performance monitoring and optimization of AI models🔹 Required Skills: Strong expertise in Prompt Engineering, LangChain, and LlamaIndex Experience with LLMs, RAG, and vector databases (Pinecone, FAISS, ChromaDB, Weaviate) Proficiency in Python, FastAPI, Flask, Django REST API Familiarity with Dify.AI and AI workflow automation (Preferred) Understanding of AI security, ethical AI, and prompt injection mitigation🔹 Job Details: Location: Ahmedabad (Onsite – Only Work From Office) Experience: Minimum 3+ years in AI/LLM development Immediate joiners preferred Budget: Based on experience & current CTC
📩 Interested candidates can share their CV at: ankita.raval@arsenaltech.com

title: Prompt Engineer - GEN AI
description:
Overview

The overall purpose of the GenAI Prompt Engineer position is to develop and optimize high-quality prompts for NLP applications. Collaborate with data scientists, machine learning engineers, and software developers to understand requirements and design effective prompt generation solutions.

Responsibilities

Conduct research and analyze state-of-the-art AI techniques to improve prompt generation models and algorithms.

Implement and deploy AI models and algorithms in production environments, ensuring scalability, reliability, and performance.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate prompt generation capabilities into existing NLP applications.

Conduct experiments, analyze data, and provide insights to improve the performance and effectiveness of prompt generation models.

Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI and NLP research and apply relevant techniques to enhance prompt generation capabilities.

Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications.

Troubleshoot and debug issues related to prompt generation models and algorithms.

Document and communicate research findings, methodologies, and technical specifications to team members and stakeholders.

Requirements

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

Master's or Ph.D. degree in AI, NLP, or a related field is preferred.

Proven experience in AI and NLP, preferably in prompt generation or related areas.

Strong programming skills in languages such as Python or Java.

Experience with AI frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Keras.

Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP, or Azure.

Knowledge of software development methodologies and best practices.

Experience with version control systems such as Git.

Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to think critically and creatively.

Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with a strong sense of responsibility and accountability.

Required Skills:

Strong proficiency in AI and NLP techniques, including deep learning, neural networks, and natural language processing.

Experience with AI programming languages such as Python, TensorFlow, or PyTorch.

Solid understanding of machine learning algorithms and their applications in NLP.

Proficiency in data analysis, statistical modeling, and experimental design.

Familiarity with prompt generation techniques and algorithms.

Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.

Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.

Excellent communication and presentation skills.

Ability to multitask and prioritize workload effectively.

Strong attention to detail and a commitment to producing high-quality work.

Note: This job description is not exhaustive and may be subject to change or modification as per the company's needs.

title: Prompt Engineer
description:
Skills:
Problem-solving, Communication, Technical writing, Analytical thinking, Attention to detail, Time management, Adaptability, Artificial Intellegence,

Skills

A prompt engineer's job is to design, create, and optimize prompts for AI systems. They use a combination of technical skills, creative writing, and analytical thinking to do the following:

Develop prompts: Create prompts for text generation, translation, question answering, and creative writing Collaborate: Work with product teams, data scientists, and engineers to understand user needs Analyze data: Interpret data, evaluate prompt performance, and identify patterns Troubleshoot: Investigate and correct issues and bugs that may arise in AI prompt systems Communicate: Work effectively with other team members and stakeholders 

Some Other Skills That Prompt Engineers Should Have Include

Natural language processing (NLP)A deep understanding of NLP techniques is required to develop prompts that guide chatbots to respond to user input Inference efficiencyThis skill focuses on minimizing the time and resources required for an LLM to generate output based on prompts PortfolioA portfolio of AI prompts and how they were used to achieve valuable output can give prompt engineers an advantage in job applications Creating AI Influencers and making video with them
